name: Minor Striking
description: +1 to Attack and 2x base weapon dice for Damage rolls

name: Striking
description: +2 to Attack and 3x base weapon dice for Damage rolls

name: Major Striking
description: +3 to Attack and 4x base weapon dice for Damage rolls

name: Returning
description: Whenever you make a thrown attack with this weapon, it returns to your hand upon completion of the attack.

name: Shifting
description: You may use an action to change the shape of this weapon into another of the same type (ranged -/-> melee)

name: Elemental
description: This weapon deals an additional damage die of an elemental type of your choosing

name: Keen
description: Your critical range with this weapon is decreased by 1.

name: Greater Shifting
description: You may use an action to change the shape of this weapon into another of any type.

name: Dancing
description: As a 3 action ability, you can activate your weapon, which will begin to hover and act autonomously. At the beginning of your turn, it will fly up to 40â€™ towards your nearest enemy and attack them, using your melee attack and damage modifiers. At the end of your turn, succeed a DC5 flat check to keep the weapon active; otherwise it falls to the ground.

name: Swift
description: On each of your turns, you gain an extra action that can only be used to make an attack with this weapon.

name: Vorpal
description: On a natural 20 on die, your enemy must make a Fortitude saving throw against a DC = 9 + your melee attack modifier or be decapitated.
